short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches and displays IP address and information of a domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Domain IP Info Fetcher is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to provide you with essential information about the IP address of any domain you visit. With just one click, you can view details such as the IP address, country, region, city, and Internet Service Provider (ISP) associated with the domain.

Key Features
1. Instant IP Information: Automatically fetches IP details for the current website when you open the extension popup.
2. Comprehensive Data: Displays the IP address, country, region, city, and ISP information.
3. Clean and Modern Design: Features a user-friendly and minimalist interface for easy reading.
4. No Setup Required: Just install the extension and start using it right away.
